post:
EVL Gaming Fast Deploy Exclusive LET offer!
====
[EVL Gaming] is happy to announce its new fast deploy dedicated servers! Some of the main features include:

  - Observium Metric monitoring (shows CPU/Memory/Bandwidth usage)
  - 5 Free nodeping 1-minute checks an $8 value! (Submit a ticket after order) 
  - 20TB Bandwidth on 1gbps port
  - Deployed in 2-6 hours*  If we're late you get $10 credit
  - /29 IP allocation (5 usable IP's) 

*Applies only to customers who use default set of operating systems and do not make hardware changes (hdd/memory adjustments)


Our Network
----

* [Speed Test Mini] - Kansas City, MO (Wholesale Internet)
* [WGET Friendly Speed Test] - 1GB Download
* [Network Operations] - View our NetOps status page


LET exclusives!
----
_Lifetime recurring discounts! Act fast_


**_AMD Phenom II X4 965 @ 3.4Ghz  - Quad Core_**

* 16GB DDR3 RAM 
* 500GB HDD
* 20TB Bandwidth 1gbps port
* /29 IP addresses (5 usable) 
* Observium Metric Monitoring 
* 5 Nodeping checks
* Deployed in 2-6 hours!
* [Order the Phenom] **_$45/mo with coupon code LETphenom_**

**_AMD FX-4100 @ 3.6Ghz / 3.8Ghz Turbo  - Quad Core_**

* 8GB DDR3 RAM 
* 500GB HDD
* 20TB Bandwidth 1gbps port
* /29 IP addresses (5 usable) 
* Observium Metric Monitoring 
* 5 Nodeping checks
* Deployed in 2-6 hours!
* [Order the FX] **_$48/mo with coupon code LETfx_**
